pr_title: Issue 4648: System tests are failing with zookeeper-operator 0.2.6-rc1

timeline.message:
Changed the replicated size field to replicas

Signed-off-by: anisha.kj <anisha.kj@dell.com>

timeline.bodyText: This change seems implies that the newer zookeeper operator is not backward compatible. Is that the case ? if yes could share the zookeeper-operator version above which this change will work.
timeline.author: shrids
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -239,7 +239,7 @@ private V1Deployment getDeployment() {
                 .put("kind", CUSTOM_RESOURCE_KIND)
                 .put("metadata", ImmutableMap.of("name", deploymentName))
                 .put("spec", ImmutableMap.builder().put("image",  getImageSpec(DOCKER_REGISTRY + PREFIX + "/" + ZOOKEEPER_IMAGE_NAME, PRAVEGA_ZOOKEEPER_IMAGE_VERSION))
-                                         .put("size", clusterSize)
+                                         .put("replicas", clusterSize)

replies.bodyText: The changes are backward compatible as replicas filed is available in previous zookeeper  versions as well.
replies.author: anishakj
